title: GetPropertyAccessRight (Method)
text:
METHOD GetPropertyAccessRight : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the client side access rights for a specified BACnet-Property of this BACnet-Object (propID). These restrictions only hold for
client side access of the specified BACnet-Property.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment:
The property ID for which the access right shall be
determined.

rows.Name: accessRight
rows.Comment: The property access rights after a call to this method.
